channel.title: Home on Scott Knight
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Scott Knight

item.title: Inspiration for this Site
item.description: Some of the people and ideas that inspired me to make this site: zwbetz for his invaluable Hugo tutorial and site design, which was emulated while learning Hugo to create this site (design will be evolving soon) Suckless Software Philosophy Karl Bartel’s Exercises in Simplicity The 512K Club, a collective of performance-minded developers striving to make the internet less of a bloated mess
